responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Potential information disclosure through directory listing
    analysis: |
      The index.html file in the Upload/images/ougc_awards/ directory appears to be a blank placeholder page. This could be an attempt to prevent directory listing, but it may not be effective on all web server configurations. If directory listing is enabled on the server, an attacker could potentially view and access other files in this directory, which may contain sensitive information or resources not intended for public access. This could lead to unauthorized information disclosure if sensitive images or data are stored in this location.
    cwe: CWE-548
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - Upload/images/ougc_awards/index.html
    classification: slightly promising

```

leads.headline: Potential information disclosure through directory listing
leads.analysis: The index.html file in the Upload/images/ougc_awards/ directory appears to be a blank placeholder page. This could be an attempt to prevent directory listing, but it may not be effective on all web server configurations. If directory listing is enabled on the server, an attacker could potentially view and access other files in this directory, which may contain sensitive information or resources not intended for public access. This could lead to unauthorized information disclosure if sensitive images or data are stored in this location.
